name: Opticians, Optical Goods, and Eyeglasses
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that read prescriptions for visual correction, order lenses,
make and sell eyeglasses and contact lenses, and may perform eye
examinations. Opticians may also sell a variety of optical goods such
as safety glasses, sunglasses (prescription and regular), carrying
cases, and eyeglass and contact lens solutions. One-hour eyeglasses
merchants generally located in shopping malls are included.
For merchants that examine eyes and treat eye defects with
procedures that may involve surgery or surgical techniques, use MCC
8042.
